TopicTitle: Adding a Fuel tank Adapter - 3.75m to 2.5m

Articles.Content:
There are fuel tank adapter for many sizes but I am missing one for 3.75m to 2.5m.

So I'm requesting a [Kerbodyne ADTP-2-3](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerbodyne_ADTP-2-3) adapter full of fuel!

Personally I use Mk3 adapters for 3.75-to-2.5

[http://imgur.com/bK8NTSi](http://imgur.com/bK8NTSi)

Though I always thought that having separate parts for "with fuel" and "without fuel" is a bit silly since they've made tweakable fuel amount. Why not just leave only adapters with fuel? If people don't need fuel inside, they always could just set it to zero.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T14:34:18Z" title="06/23/2015 02:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by RidingTheFlow**
You can always hide the engine and a part of a tank in a fairing. It'll look just like adapter and will probably weigh less.
